resources.string: This app allows you to easily enable, restart or disable ADB.
Root permissions weren\'t granted. In order to start and stop services, this app needs to run commands as root.
Your device does not appear to be rooted. This app needs to run commands with elevated permissions.
The root command failed to execute.

Allows the application to control debug mode without your intervention. Debug mode can be used to copy data between your computer and your device, install applications on your device without notification, and read log data.
